name: Resource & Exploration Mapping Pty Ltd
tag_list: resource, mining, exploration, mapping, cartography, gis, geospatial-information-systems, tenements, surveying, 3d-visualisation, projections, datums, data-administration, data-management, data-capture, data-compilation, data-conversion, mapinfo, discover
overview:
Resource & Exploration Mapping Pty Ltd (REM) is a Geographic Information System (GIS) company servicing the mining, exploration and environmental industries.

REM has extensive experience and expert knowledge in GIS. We pride ourselves on providing our clients with responsive and reliable GIS consultancy services that exceed expectations.

Resource & Exploration Mapping Pty Ltd (REM) was formed in 1998 with a focus on data compilation and map production for exploration, mining and environmental companies. We have since grown to 11 employees and have broadened our scope to provide a unique range of services rarely found in a GIS organisation. Our expert team can deliver solutions to all your GIS needs from computer hardware and software to surveying and database administration.
